message.content:
Sure! Here's a sample healthy meal plan for you for seven days, taking into account your restrictions:

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with berries and chia seeds
Snack: Apple slices with almond butter
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing
Dinner: Quinoa stir-fry with vegetables (such as broccoli, carrots, bell peppers) and tofu or tempeh
Snack: Roasted sweet potato wedges with a drizzle of olive oil and cinnamon
Day 2:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and avocado
Snack: Hard-boiled egg with carrot sticks
Lunch: Turkey sandwich on whole grain bread with lettuce, tomato, and mustard
Dinner: Lentil soup with vegetables (such as carrots, celery, onions)
Snack: Roasted chickpeas with a sprinkle of paprika and salt
Day 3:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with banana, spinach, almond milk, and protein powder
Snack: Hummus and vegetable sticks (such as carrots, celery)
Lunch: Black bean tacos with lettuce, tomato, and salsa
Dinner: Grilled salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
Snack: Fresh fruit salad with a drizzle of honey (if you're not restricted from it)
Day 4:
Breakfast: Overnight oats made with rolled oats, almond milk, chia seeds, and berries
Snack: Roasted pumpkin seeds with a sprinkle of cinnamon
Lunch: Chicken stir-fry with vegetables (such as bell peppers, onions) and brown rice
Dinner: Lentil soup with vegetables (such as carrots, celery, onions)
Snack: Roasted almonds
Day 5:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with berries and chia seeds
Snack: Apple slices with almond butter
Lunch: Turkey wrap with lettuce, tomato, and mustard
Dinner: Quinoa stir-fry with vegetables (such as broccoli, carrots, bell peppers) and tofu or tempeh
Snack: Roasted sweet potato wedges with a drizzle of olive oil and cinnamon
Day 6:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and avocado
Snack: Hard-boiled egg with carrot sticks
Lunch: Turkey sandwich on whole grain bread with lettuce, tomato, and mustard
Dinner: Lentil soup with vegetables (such as carrots, celery, onions)
Snack: Roasted chickpeas with a sprinkle of paprika and salt
Day 7:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with banana, spinach, almond milk, and protein powder
Snack: Hummus and vegetable sticks (such as carrots, celery)
Lunch: Black bean tacos with lettuce, tomato, and salsa
Dinner: Grilled salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
Snack: Fresh fruit salad with a drizzle of honey (if you're not restricted from it)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.
